description: This file contains Polymer framework feature definitions, including template preparation, host registration, content distribution, and DOM API extensions, primarily for Polymer 1.x. It manages shadow DOM, content insertion, and node observation.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi
classes.description: Provides DOM manipulation and observation APIs, including node insertion, removal, cloning, importing, and querying, with support for Shadow DOM and Shady DOM.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi.ClassList
classes.description: Wrapper for classList property, allowing class manipulation with automatic parent distribution updates.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi.EffectiveNodesObserver
classes.description: Observes effective DOM nodes, including content and distributed nodes, with support for mutation observation in Shadow DOM.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi.DistributedNodesObserver
classes.description: Specialized observer for distributed nodes in Shadow DOM, extending EffectiveNodesObserver.

classes.name: Polymer.EventApi
classes.description: Wraps DOM events to provide consistent access to event properties across Shadow DOM boundaries.

methods.name: _addNode
methods.description: Handles adding a node to the DOM, managing logical and composed parent relationships, and distributing content if necessary.

methods.name: notifyObserver
methods.description: Notifies content observers of DOM changes.

methods.name: _ownerShadyRootForNode
methods.description: Recursively finds or assigns the owner shady root for a node.

methods.name: distributeContent
methods.description: Distributes content into insertion points within Shadow DOM.
